de.tud.plt.r43ples.management

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.plt.r43ples.management.Config

  • public class Config
extends Object
    General configuration handling. Stores all important configuration from R43ples. Can read from configuration file.
    Author:
    Markus Graube, Stephan Hensel
